description:
Dot likes to perform, and it makes Dot happy when you clap for the show.  
Let's clap to make Dot smile!

puzzles.description: Make Dot automatically turn off all eye lights.

hints.description: Drag out an Eye Ring state. Make sure all of the eye lights are turned off. Link the state with an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: Make Dot turn on one eye light when a clap is heard.

hints.description: Link the new Eye Ring state with a Clap Heard cue.

puzzles.description: Make Dot turn on a new eye light each time you clap.

hints.description: Link the states with Clap Heard cues.

puzzles.description: After Dot is smiling, make Dot automatically play a happy sound!

hints.description: Drag out a happy sound and choose something for Dot to say. Link the sound with an Auto cue.
